jobs.title: IT Intern
jobs.description: Assist the IT team in maintaining and developing technical solutions. Basic programming skills required.

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description: Work with the marketing team to develop digital campaigns. Knowledge of social media and SEO is a plus.

jobs.title: HR Intern
jobs.description: Assist the HR department with recruitment and employee relations. Basic knowledge of HR tools and processes preferred.

jobs.title: Finance Intern
jobs.description: Support the finance team in budgeting, forecasting, and financial reporting. Basic knowledge of financial tools and accounting software is required.

jobs.title: Accounts Intern
jobs.description: Assist with daily accounting operations, bookkeeping, and financial record maintenance.

jobs.title: Legal Intern
jobs.description: Assist the legal team with research, case preparation, and document drafting.
